titleStmt.title: SII 6.350: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 350. (A.R. No. 67 of 1898). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiruvāykkeḻvi muṉṉāka tribhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ maturaiyum Īḻamuṅ karuvūrum pāṇṭiyaṉ muṭittalaiyuṅ koṇṭaruḷi virar Abhiṣekamum vicaiyar Abhiṣekamum paṇṇiAruḷiṉa tribhuvaṉa
viradevaṟku yāṇṭu 3 10 7 Āvatu mithuṉanāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣat=tu navamiyuM nāyaṟṟukkiḻamaiyūm peṟṟa Attattu nāḷ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kāliyūṟkoṭṭattut taṉiyūr Uttara
melūrāṉa śrīrājentracoḻaccaturvvedimaṅkalat=tu mahāsabhaiyom Eḻuttu nammūr Uṭaiyār tiruppulivaṉamuṭaiya nāyaṉāṟkut tirunun=tāviḷakku Erippatāka Eṅkaḷ pūrvva
puruṣahaḷ palar pakkalum poṉkoṇṭu poliyūṭṭukku Erikkakkaṭavarkaḷāka muṉṉāḷil kalveṭṭiṉa tiru viḷakkukkaḷ rājamāttāṇḍaṉākiya Aparājitavikramavanmarkku yāṇṭu 10 4 Āvatu
nāḷil sūryyagrahaṇattin nāḷ rājamāttāṇḍaṉākiya Aparājitavikkiramavanmarpakkal kaikkoṇṭa pon niṟai cempoṉ nūṟṟuk kaḻañcukku Erikkakkaṭavatāka Uṭaiyār tiruppulivaṉamuṭaiyārkoyililum naṭuviṟkoyili
luṅ kalveṭṭiṉa nilaiviḷakku nālum naṭuviṟkoyiliṟ kalveṭṭiṉapaṭi kacciyuntañcaiyuṅ koṇṭa kaṉṉaratevaṟku patiṉeṭṭāvatu Ikkoṭṭattu viṟpeṭunāṭṭu veḷṣāṟṟu vaṅkippuṟattu Uruttiraveḻampai
c ciṟunaṅkaiccāṉikkāka vaṅkippuṟattut tiṇṭavikramavittaṉākiya caṇḍeśvaratāsaṉ pakkal Ivaḷukku dhanmamāka koṇṭa poṉpaṉṉiru kaḻañcaraikkum Erikkakkaṭavomāṉa tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟum maturaiko
ṇṭa kopparakecarivanmarkku patiṉmūṉṟāvatu nāḷil nammūrp pāṇiyattu vāmadevakramavittar vaitta tirunantāviḷakkukku Ivar paṅkuvaḻi vaṭapiṭākai marutattūril melpakkattu talaippāṭakattu viṭṭa nilam viṟṟu
kkoṇṭu Erikkakkaṭavatākak kalveṭṭiṉa tirunaṉtāviḷakku Iraṇṭum Itdevaṟkup patinālāvatu nāḷil Ivvū rāḷuṅkaṇattāruḷ muṭiyuṟai ka nantikramavittabhaṭṭasomayājiyārpakkal kaikoṇṭa po
poṉ paṉṉiru kaḻañcaraikku Erikkakkaṭavomākak kalveṭṭiṉa tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟum Ākat tirunantāviḷakku Eṭṭuṅ kalveṭṭuppaṭiye Erikkaveṇumeṉṟu Ittiribhuvaṉaviratevaṟku muppatteḻāvatu
nāḷile śrīmāheśvarar koṉṉamaiyil Ittirunantāviḷakku Eṭṭum Eṅkaḷ pūrvvapuruṣahaḷ muṉpu kalveṭṭiṉapaṭiye Eṅkaḷukkum Erikkaveṇṭukaiyāl Ivviḷakkukku nittat tevai yiṟukka muṭiyāmai
yil śrīmāheśvararaiyum sthāṉattāraiyum Icaivukoṇṭu muṉpu Eḻuntaruḷuvittuvarukiṟa cittiraittirunāḷ tirukkoṭittirunāḷun tiruvoṇattirunāḷummuṉpu Eḻuntaruḷivarukiṟapaṭiye Eḻuntaruḷuvikkakaṭavomākavum tirukkā ko ttirunāḷmutal Eḻuntaruḷivarukiṟa nāḷ Eḻuṭaṉe Ittirunantāviḷak keṭṭukkum muṉṟunā ḷeṟṟip pattu nāḷāka muppatteṭṭāvatu cittiraittirunāḷmutal Eḻuntaruḷuvikkakkaṭavomākavum Immūṉṟu nāḷu
kkum Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi bhogadravyavyañjaṉa muḷḷiṭṭa tevaikaḷum muṉpu Eḻuntaruḷivarukiṟa nāḷopāti nāḷoṉṟukku ceṉṟuvantapaṭiye Eṟṟiṉa nāḷukkuṅ kuṟai viṟuttu Eḻuntaruḷuvikkakkaṭavomākavum Ippaṭi muṭṭāme candrādityaruḷḷataṉaikkālamum Eḻuntaruḷuvikkakkaṭavomāka śilālekhai paṇṇikkuṭuttom Uttaramelūrāṉa rājentracoḻaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom sabhaiyuḷiruntu perumakka
ḷ paṇikka Eḻutiṉeṉ Ivvūr madhyasthaṉ cekkuṟi niṟaṇintāṉ catiraṉ rājendracoḻapriyaṉeṉ Eḻuttu sabhaiyuḷiruntu perumakkaḷ paṇikka Eḻutiṉeṉ madhyasthaṉ cekkuṟi tirukkāḷattiuṭaiyāṉ varaNtaruvāṉāṉa Uttaramelūruṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 6.350 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
